root.name: radians()
root.description: Converts a degree fixed point value measurement to its corresponding fixed point value in radians. Radians and degrees are two ways of measuring the same thing. There are 360 degrees in a circle and 2*PI radians in a circle. For example, 90° = PI/2 = 1.5707964. All trigonometric methods in Processing require their parameters to be specified in radian fixed point values.
